titles.title: Providing for an adjournment or recess of the two Houses.
Providing for an adjournment or recess of the two Houses.

vote.text: Passed/agreed to in House: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 211 - 204 (Roll no. 132).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 211 - 204 (Roll no. 132).
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Declares that, when the House adjourns on the legislative day of Thursday, March 13, 2008, or Friday, March 14, 2008, it stand adjourned until 2 p.m. on Monday, March 31, 2008.
Declares that, when the Senate recesses or adjourns on any day from Thursday, March 13, 2008, through Friday, March 28, 2008, it stand recessed or adjourned until noon on Monday, March 31, 2008.
